nodes.text: Delilah S. Dawson (born October 21, 1977) is an American author best known for creating the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge character Vi Moradi, who has appeared in her books Phasma and Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire. Dawson has also written comics and short stories, including her first Star Wars project, "The Perfect Weapon"—set before the events of The Force Awakens,
Outside of Star Wars, she is known for the Blud series and the young-adult novels Servants of the Storm and Hit.
